attributes.action: Require period products list all materials/chemical/ingredients on packaging
attributes.additional_details: Manufacturers are required to to evaluate the safety of raw materials, finished product and instructions for use, but we believe this is insufficient and that manufacturers are NOT sufficiently interested in the adverse effects that their products may cause. We should have a right to know what we are putting inside our bodies to make informed choices on use.
attributes.background: We want the Government to require that all period products include a full list of all materials, chemicals and ingredients in the product. This way people can make informed decisions on what product to use.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
